description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Indie Island needs a new Defender to protect it. Play as Rik, a kid from a small town. Play through different areas to collect new cards to build your deck and train to get stronger. Become the new Defender of Indie Island in this multi-genre game!
description.short: Indie Island needs a new Defender to protect it. Play as Rik, a kid from a small town. Play through different areas to collect new cards to build your deck and train to get stronger. Become the new Defender of Indie Island in this multi-genre game!
